snippet: The handmade house, doughty and particular, is being celebrated in three new books.
abstract: Books Handmade Houses: A Century of Earth Friendly Home Design by Richard Olsen, Tiny Houses, Simple Shelter: Scaling Back in the 21st Century by Lloyd Kahn and Palaces by Perla Lichi all celebrate the handmade home.
lead_paragraph: The handmade house, doughty and particular, is being celebrated in three new books.

headline.seo: New Books on Homes, From Modest to Palatial
headline.main: Be It Ever So Humble, Really
headline.print_headline: Be It Ever So Humble, Really
